Name: Redemption's Guild
About the game: Explore two large maps with a plethora of landscapes to be viewed and secrets to be discovered. Fight in the arena or delve into our confined labyrinth map, where you'll have to find your way to the end. Just try not to get lost. Choose from 36 acquirable sets of equipment per class. These can be interchanged per piece at an average of 3-4 pieces a set, giving you 200k+ unique variations for each class. Put on your favorite garb before you head out for your next adventure. Venture into the world and acquire experience to advance both your class and account levels. This is just one of the primary methods of increasing your attributes, making it a bit easier to survive as you face new challenges. Be brave in your adventures throughout Stellaria, as youâ€™ll be facing danger around every corner. Each encounter is unique, as enemies may dodge magic spells, lure you into ambushes, call for help, and more! Important: There is a known vibration/haptic feedback issue with Oculus Rift S and Quest 1/2 (usable with link cable only) controllers.
